titleproper.value:
Guide to the Crago-Kramer Collection of Sugar Packets
                    <lb/>circa 1939-1960s
                    <lb/>
                    <num>PR 354</num>

author.value: Finding aid prepared by Larry Weimer

creation.value:
This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit
                <date>2018-03-23T16:24-0400</date>

abstract.label: Abstract
abstract.value: The Crago-Kramer collection includes a variety of sugar packets from New York City and New York State, dating from the 1930s-1960s. The packets are often distinctive in that they refer to particular business establishments, especially hotels and restaurants, institutions, and some events, notably the World's Fairs of 1939-40 and of 1964-65 and the 1980 Winter Olympics.

p.value: Open to qualified researchers by appointment only.
Credit line: Donated by Clive Probert. Originally collected by Priscilla Hayward Crago of Albany, and Martin & Esther Kramer of Brooklyn.

(The above was based on information from Probert's 
                <extref ns2:actuate="onRequest" ns2:href="https://sites.google.com/site/cliveprobert/home">website</extref> as of February 2018.)

Images of many of these packets can be found at the web site of the collection's donor; 
                <extref ns2:actuate="onRequest" ns2:href="https://sites.google.com/site/cliveprobert/sugarpacketcollection/priscilla-hayward-crago-collection">click here</extref>.
